name: Zorc Necrophades
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by the effect of "Diabound #6", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card's Special Summon cannot be negated. Unaffected by other cards' effects. Cannot be Tributed, or used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon. Cannot be destroyed by battle except by a DIVINE monster. This card's ATK/DEF are equal to the highest ATK on the field. While you control this card, you cannot lose the Duel. If this card is destroyed by battle: You lose the Duel.
